title: You owe it to yourself to experience a total solar eclipse
description: On August 21, 2017, the moon's shadow raced from Oregon to South Carolina in what some consider to be the most awe-inspiring spectacle in all of nature: a total solar eclipse. Umbraphile David Baron chases these rare events across the globe, and in this ode to the bliss of seeing the solar corona, he explains why you owe it to yourself to witness one, too.
author: David Baron
keywords: TED, talks, beauty, astronomy, nature, science, solar system, TEDx, universe, Moon, Sun
